meanings.definition: A red, crystalline compound used as a dye.
meanings.sent1: The fuchsin added a bright red color to the fabric.
meanings.sent2: She used fuchsin to dye her scarf a vibrant shade of red.
meanings.sent3: The fuchsin spilled on the table, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with hues of fuchsin and orange.
meanings.sent5: The fuchsin dye stood out vividly against the white background.

meanings.definition: To dye or color with fuchsin.
meanings.sent1: They fuchsined the cloth to give it a deep red hue.
meanings.sent2: He fuchsined the flowers to make them more vibrant.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally fuchsined her hands while coloring the fabric.
meanings.sent4: The artist fuchsined the canvas, creating a striking contrast.
meanings.sent5: The dye fuchsined the fabric beautifully, enhancing its appearance.
